name: life-safety-operation-request
description: Represents a BACnet Life Safety Operation Request, used to request a specific operation on a life safety object, including the requesting process information and optional target object.

fields.name: requesting-process-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the process making the life safety operation request.

fields.name: requesting-source
fields.description: A character string identifying the source of the request.

fields.name: request
fields.description: The life safety operation being requested.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: Optional identifier of the target BACnet object for the operation.
